name: FDL 2 (DEMO)
description:
Here is a very early look at FDL 2.

Currently you can experience an early version of the game with no sound but all basic controls and a few levels implemented. For now see how many coins you can collect! 

Challenge mode is not yet implemented. 

Updates will be coming soon. Some of the planned features include shops, bosses, two more zones and a lot more pickups, spells, weapons and levels.
